channel.title: [Release] RSC 3D Model Viewer + Source
channel.description:
Lightweight and easy to use, however can use some improvement.
Code is very clean, however very limited on comments, so it can be confusing if your new to java/swing/bz2
Feel free to change some things around and make it more user friendly, so the community can use it!
Anyways, here it is
http://uppit.com/4a8spep087gi/Model_Editor.rar

item.title: [Release] RSC 3D Model Viewer + Source
item.dc:creator: @Wife_Beater Wife Beater
item.description:
@Wife_Beater wrote:

[quote=“imthenull, post:24, topic:478528”][quote author=q3ase link=topic=596753.msg4202757#msg4202757 date=1358459143]

[code] public OBJ objConvert(int s) {
byte[] is = archive.getFile(s);
int i = 0;
int j = DataOperations.getUnsigned2Bytes(is, i);
i += 2;
int k = DataOperations.getUnsigned2Bytes(is, i);
i += 2;
OBJ obj = new OBJ(j, k);
for (int l = 0; l < j; l++) {
obj.verts[l][0] = DataOperations.getSigned2Bytes(is, i);
i += 2;
}
for (int l = 0; l < j; l++) {
obj.verts[l][1] = DataOperations.getSigned2Bytes(is, i);
i += 2;
}
for (int l = 0; l < j; l++) {
obj.verts[l][2] = DataOperations.getSigned2Bytes(is, i);
i += 2;
}

	int[] num_points = new int[k];
	for (int l = 0; l < k; l++)
		num_points[l] = is[i++] & 0xff;
	
	for (int l1 = 0; l1 < k; l1++) {
		i += 2;
	}
	for (int l1 = 0; l1 < k; l1++) {
		i += 2;
	}
	for (int l1 = 0; l1 < k; l1++) {
		i++;
	}
	for (int l2 = 0; l2 < k; l2++) {
		for (int i3 = 0; i3 < k; i3++)
			if (j < 256) {
				obj.face_verts[i3] = is[i++] & 0xff;
			} else {
				obj.face_verts[i3] = DataOperations
						.getUnsigned2Bytes(is, i);
				i += 2;
			}
	}
	return obj;
}

class OBJ {
	int[][] verts;
	int vertSize;
	int[] face_verts;
	int faceSize;
	
	public OBJ(int vertSize, int faceSize) {
		this.vertSize = vertSize;
		this.verts = new int[vertSize][2];
		this.faceSize = faceSize;
		this.face_verts = new int[faceSize];
	}
	
	@Override
	public String toString() {
		StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();
		for (int j=0; j < vertSize; j++) {
			sb.append("v");
			for (int i = 0; i < 3; i++) {
				sb.append(" "+verts[j][i]);
			}
		}
		for (int j=0; j < faceSize; j++) {
			sb.append("f");
			for (int i = 0; i < 3; i++) {
				
			}
		}
		return sb.toString();
	}
}[/code]

Complete it yourself.
[/quote]
neet i might do just that[/quote]

Nice. Someone will make good use out of that. Upload finished editor in this post when finished por favor

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @q3ase q3ase
item.description:
@q3ase wrote:

[code] public OBJ objConvert(int s) {
byte[] is = archive.getFile(s);
int i = 0;
int j = DataOperations.getUnsigned2Bytes(is, i);
i += 2;
int k = DataOperations.getUnsigned2Bytes(is, i);
i += 2;
OBJ obj = new OBJ(j, k);
for (int l = 0; l < j; l++) {
obj.verts[l][0] = DataOperations.getSigned2Bytes(is, i);
i += 2;
}
for (int l = 0; l < j; l++) {
obj.verts[l][1] = DataOperations.getSigned2Bytes(is, i);
i += 2;
}
for (int l = 0; l < j; l++) {
obj.verts[l][2] = DataOperations.getSigned2Bytes(is, i);
i += 2;
}

	int[] num_points = new int[k];
	for (int l = 0; l < k; l++)
		num_points[l] = is[i++] & 0xff;
	
	for (int l1 = 0; l1 < k; l1++) {
		i += 2;
	}
	for (int l1 = 0; l1 < k; l1++) {
		i += 2;
	}
	for (int l1 = 0; l1 < k; l1++) {
		i++;
	}
	for (int l2 = 0; l2 < k; l2++) {
		for (int i3 = 0; i3 < k; i3++)
			if (j < 256) {
				obj.face_verts[i3] = is[i++] & 0xff;
			} else {
				obj.face_verts[i3] = DataOperations
						.getUnsigned2Bytes(is, i);
				i += 2;
			}
	}
	return obj;
}

class OBJ {
	int[][] verts;
	int vertSize;
	int[] face_verts;
	int faceSize;
	
	public OBJ(int vertSize, int faceSize) {
		this.vertSize = vertSize;
		this.verts = new int[vertSize][2];
		this.faceSize = faceSize;
		this.face_verts = new int[faceSize];
	}
	
	@Override
	public String toString() {
		StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();
		for (int j=0; j < vertSize; j++) {
			sb.append("v");
			for (int i = 0; i < 3; i++) {
				sb.append(" "+verts[j][i]);
			}
		}
		for (int j=0; j < faceSize; j++) {
			sb.append("f");
			for (int i = 0; i < 3; i++) {

}[/code]

item.title: [Release] RSC 3D Model Viewer + Source
item.dc:creator: @q3ase q3ase
item.description:
@q3ase wrote:

T_x’s

[code]/*

  • Created by JFormDesigner on Sun Jan 22 12:23:49 GMT 2012
    */

package net.mark.rsc.UI;

import java.awt.;
import java.awt.event.;
import java.io.File;
import java.io.FileInputStream;
import java.io.IOException;
import java.io.RandomAccessFile;

import javax.swing.*;

import com.jagex.Models;
import com.jagex.IO.Archive;

import net.mark.rsc.models.Camera;
import net.mark.rsc.models.Model;
import net.mark.rsc.models.formats.rs2.RSModel;
import net.mark.rsc.utils.ModelViewer;
import net.mark.rsc.utils.Util;

/**

  • @author Mark Gore
    */
    public class MainUI extends JFrame {
    private ModelViewer modelPanel;
    private Archive jagexArchive;

    public MainUI() {
    initComponents();
    File jag = new File(“models”);
    try {
    jagexArchive = new Archive(Util.getFileBytes(jag.getAbsolutePath()));
    Models.load(jagexArchive);
    setup();
    getModelPanel().setModel(Models.modelsCache[100].buildRSCModel());
    } catch (IOException e) {
    e.printStackTrace();
    }
    setVisible(true);
    }

    public Model updatePreview(String models) {
    byte[] modelData = readFile(models);
    RSModel model = new RSModel(modelData);
    Model m;
    m = model.toModel();
    return m;
    }

    public static byte[] readFile(String fileName) {
    try {
    FileInputStream fis = new FileInputStream(fileName);
    byte[] data = new byte[fis.available()];
    fis.read(data, 0, fis.available());
    return data;
    } catch (IOException e) {
    return null;
    }
    }

    public void setup() {
    setModelPanel(new ModelViewer());
    getModelPanel().setDrawFrame(false);
    getModelPanel().setDrawVerts(false);
    getModelPanel().setSize(scrollPane1.getWidth(), scrollPane1.getHeight());
    scrollPane1.add(getModelPanel());
    Camera camera = getModelPanel().getOurCamera();
    camera.setZ(420);
    camera.setAngleX((float) Math.toRadians(25));
    scrollPane1.setViewportView(getModelPanel());
    }

    public ModelViewer getModelPanel() {
    return modelPanel;
    }

    private void lines(ActionEvent e) {
    if(getModelPanel().isDrawFrame()) {
    getModelPanel().setDrawFrame(true);
    } else {
    getModelPanel().setDrawFrame(false);
    }
    }

    private void polys(ActionEvent e) {
    if(getModelPanel().isDrawVerts()) {
    getModelPanel().setDrawVerts(true);
    } else {
    getModelPanel().setDrawVerts(false);
    }
    }

    private void initComponents() {
    // JFormDesigner - Component initialization - DO NOT MODIFY //GEN-BEGIN:initComponents
    menuBar1 = new JMenuBar();
    menu1 = new JMenu();
    checkBoxMenuItem1 = new JCheckBoxMenuItem();
    checkBoxMenuItem2 = new JCheckBoxMenuItem();
    scrollPane1 = new JScrollPane();

     //======== this ========
 setTitle("RSC Test");
 Container contentPane = getContentPane();
 contentPane.setLayout(null);

 //======== menuBar1 ========
 {

 	//======== menu1 ========
 	{
 		menu1.setText("Model View");

 		//---- checkBoxMenuItem1 ----
 		checkBoxMenuItem1.setText("Lines");
 		checkBoxMenuItem1.addActionListener(new ActionListener() {
 			public void actionPerformed(ActionEvent e) {
 				lines(e);
 			}
 		});
 		menu1.add(checkBoxMenuItem1);

 		//---- checkBoxMenuItem2 ----
 		checkBoxMenuItem2.setText("Polygons");
 		checkBoxMenuItem2.addActionListener(new ActionListener() {
 			public void actionPerformed(ActionEvent e) {
 				polys(e);
 			}
 		});
 		menu1.add(checkBoxMenuItem2);
 	}
 	menuBar1.add(menu1);
 }
 setJMenuBar(menuBar1);
 contentPane.add(scrollPane1);
 scrollPane1.setBounds(0, 0, 635, 410);

 { // compute preferred size
 	Dimension preferredSize = new Dimension();
 	for(int i = 0; i < contentPane.getComponentCount(); i++) {
 		Rectangle bounds = contentPane.getComponent(i).getBounds();
 		preferredSize.width = Math.max(bounds.x + bounds.width, preferredSize.width);
 		preferredSize.height = Math.max(bounds.y + bounds.height, preferredSize.height);
 	}
 	Insets insets = contentPane.getInsets();
 	preferredSize.width += insets.right;
 	preferredSize.height += insets.bottom;
 	contentPane.setMinimumSize(preferredSize);
 	contentPane.setPreferredSize(preferredSize);
 }
 pack();
 setLocationRelativeTo(getOwner());
 // JFormDesigner - End of component initialization  //GEN-END:initComponents

    }

    public void setModelPanel(ModelViewer modelPanel) {
    this.modelPanel = modelPanel;
    }

    // JFormDesigner - Variables declaration - DO NOT MODIFY //GEN-BEGIN:variables
    private JMenuBar menuBar1;
    private JMenu menu1;
    private JCheckBoxMenuItem checkBoxMenuItem1;
    private JCheckBoxMenuItem checkBoxMenuItem2;
    private JScrollPane scrollPane1;
    // JFormDesigner - End of variables declaration //GEN-END:variables
    }[/code]

Snemo:

[code]package editor.UI;

import java.awt.*;
import java.io.File;
import java.io.IOException;
import java.io.RandomAccessFile;

import javax.swing.*;

import jagex.Models;
import jagex.IO.Archive;

import editor.models.Camera;
import editor.utils.ModelViewer;
import editor.utils.Util;

/**

  • @author Sean

*/
public class MainUI extends JFrame {
private ModelViewer modelPanel;
private Archive jagexArchive;

public MainUI() {
	initComponents();
	File jag = new File("models.jag");
	try {
		jagexArchive = new Archive(Util.getFileBytes(jag.getAbsolutePath()));
		Models.load(jagexArchive);
		setup();
		getModelPanel().setModel(Models.modelsCache[1].buildRSCModel());
	} catch (IOException e) {
		e.printStackTrace();
	}
	setVisible(true);
}

public void setup() {
	setModelPanel(new ModelViewer());
	getModelPanel().setDrawFrame(false);
	getModelPanel().setDrawVerts(false);
	getModelPanel().setSize(scrollPane1.getWidth(), scrollPane1.getHeight());
	scrollPane1.add(getModelPanel());
	Camera camera = getModelPanel().getOurCamera();
	camera.setZ(420);
	camera.setAngleX((float) Math.toRadians(25));
	scrollPane1.setViewportView(getModelPanel());
}

public ModelViewer getModelPanel() {
	return modelPanel;
}

private void initComponents() {
	scrollPane1 = new JScrollPane();

	setTitle("RSC Model Editor - Written by Sean (Snemo)");
	Container contentPane = getContentPane();
	contentPane.setLayout(null);
	contentPane.add(scrollPane1);
	scrollPane1.setBounds(0, 0, 635, 410);

	{ // compute preferred size
		Dimension preferredSize = new Dimension();
		for(int i = 0; i < contentPane.getComponentCount(); i++) {
			Rectangle bounds = contentPane.getComponent(i).getBounds();
			preferredSize.width = Math.max(bounds.x + bounds.width, preferredSize.width);
			preferredSize.height = Math.max(bounds.y + bounds.height, preferredSize.height);
		}
		Insets insets = contentPane.getInsets();
		preferredSize.width += insets.right;
		preferredSize.height += insets.bottom;
		contentPane.setMinimumSize(preferredSize);
		contentPane.setPreferredSize(preferredSize);
	}
	pack();
	setLocationRelativeTo(getOwner());
}

public void setModelPanel(ModelViewer modelPanel) {
	this.modelPanel = modelPanel;
}

private JScrollPane scrollPane1;

}[/code]

Don’t you know T_x’s site where all his rsc tools are at?

lv695.png1326×789

There not posted here due to him being banned.

Read full topic
